skills.name: Sequence of instructions
skills.description: The relationship between the command and the result

skills.name: Create variables
skills.description: Give a name for some data that is in use in the program

skills.name: Event handling
skills.description: Know existing events in the game and respond to the question, what the robot should do if this event happens

skills.name: Logical expressions
skills.description: Use AND, OR combined to IF

skills.name: Data Structure
skills.description: Access data from existing data structures as 'other' and 'me' and create new structures to support game logic

skills.name: Procedures
skills.description: Name blocks of code to be reused

skills.name: Interactive process
skills.description: Grow the code piece by piece validating each step before proceeding further

skills.name: Debugging
skills.description: Use debugging functions to identify problems in the code, fixing defective robots

skills.name: Creating Math functions
skills.description: Create reusable math functions with and without parameters

skills.name: Creating Logical functions
skills.description: Isolate rules and strategy decisions in functions

skills.name: Lists
skills.description: Keeping lists shared to event handlers

skills.name: Calculate tragetory
skills.description: Identify next position of other robots
